respStmt.name: "Online Collaborative Scholarship: Principles and Practices (A CWRCShop)", at DHSI 2016 (Digital Humanities Summer Institute 2016).

sourceDesc.p: No source; originally written in digital form.

projectDesc.p: The event records were originally compiled during the week of 13-17 June 2016 in TEI format by students in the class "Online Collaborative Scholarship: Principles and Practices (A CWRCShop)", at DHSI 2016 (Digital Humanities Summer Institute 2016). The event records were transformed from TEI format to JSON format using custom XQuery code.

event.label: Sara Jeannette Duncan was born
event.desc: Sara Jeannette Duncan was born in Brantford, Ontario, on December 22, 1861, the eldest daughter of Charles Duncan and Jane Duncan (n√©e Bell).
